item.title: Important notice!!! Beyond The Edge Radio has moved... - Aug 09,2009
item.description:
Fans and friends of Beyond The Edge Radio.

For those still trying to tune in Sunday nights 9:00 to 11:00 pm to Beyond the Edge Radio, we have moved. We are no longer live Friday nights on Blog Talk Radio.  You can now find us on the Dark Plains Radio Network at www.darkplainsradio.com and Jackalope 105 FM at www.jackalope105fm. com  now on Sundays 9:30 to 11:30 pm est.  You can catch over 1 1/2 years of archives here or visit our website at www.beyondtheedgeradio.com for the latest podcasts of our shows. Thanks for visiting and we'll see you Beyond The Edge.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Beyond The Edge Radio - Jun 27,2009
item.description:
Hosts Sean Forker, Eric Altman and Joe Biello take you into the world of the Paranormal, interviewing the everyday investigator to the seasoned researcher. This will be our last week on Blog Talk Radio. We are moving to the Dark Plains Radio Network to Sunday nights 9:30 to 11:30 pm est. We invite you to tune in by going to www.darkplainsradio.com Our guest this week is paranormal investigator, Conference chairman and co-owner and co-host of Dark Plains Radio Joel Sturgis. Be sure to tune into what will be our last Beyond The Edge Radio show this Friday night 9:00 pm to 11:00 pm est.

Paranormal | Demons | Ghosts | UFOS | Cryptids

item.title: Beyond The Edge Radio leaving Blog Talk Radio. - Jun 20,2009
item.description:
On Behalf of Sean Forker, Eric Altman, Joe Biello, Scott Hackenslash and James Baker, we would like to thank you for tuning in and supporting us this past year and a half.  We have strived to bring you the best in paranormal talk radio with some fascinating topics and a wide variety of guests.  We thank each and everyone of you who have tuned in and made us a successful program.  It is because of you the listeners, where we are today.  Friday night June 26 is our last program here on Blog Talk Radio. Beginning July 5, 2009 we will make the move to the Dark Plains Radio Network with a new day and time, Sunday nights from 9:30 to 11:30 pm est.  We are taking Beyond The Edge Radio to a whole new level and we invite to join us. The journey into the mysterious and unknown has only just begun and we invite to join us as we continue to take you Beyond The Edge.  

To hear the show starting July 5, 2009 Sunday 9:30 pm to 11:30 pm est, visit www.darkplainsradio.com and click on Beyond The Edge Radio. 

Thank you again for all your support over the past year and a half and we hope you will continue to joins us each and every week!

The Beyond The Edge Radio Staff

item.description:
Hosts Eric Altman and Sean Forker welcome guest Jeff Wamsley Author of Mothman: Behind the Red Eyes and Co-author of Mothman: The Facts Behind the Legend. He also runs the Mothman Lives website and is a long time investigator of the Mothman from Point Pleasant West Virginia. Jeff is also the director of the worlds only Mothman Museum located in Point Pleasant. Join us as we learn all about this eerie legend that some folks still say exists today.
